tool_description: ChatGPT-powered Instagram Post Generator API: AI-driven tool for creating engaging, unique, and impactful Instagram content.
name: InstaGenie - Post Generator
title: InstaGenie - Post Generator

api_list.name: Instagram Post Generator
api_list.description:
This endpoint of the InstaGenie API is designed to generate Instagram post content based on the provided parameters.
It leverages the power of ChatGPT to create engaging and unique Instagram posts tailored to your specific needs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagenie-post-generator.p.rapidapi.com/v1/instagram/text-generation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagenie-post-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://instagenie-post-generator.p.rapidapi.com/v1/instagram/text-generation"
